# members

**Instance Property**

An array of instances that describe the fields in the struct.

## Declaration

```swift
var members: [MTLStructMember] { get }
```

## Discussion

Each array element in [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStructType/members] is an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStructMember] instance that corresponds to one of the fields in the struct.

## Related Documentation

- **Metal Shading Language Guide**
- **Metal Programming Guide**

## Obtaining information about struct members

- **memberByName(_:)**: Provides a representation of a struct member.

items.description: Provides a representation of a struct member.
